newsitem.title: HONG KONG: SocGen-Crosby names Asian technical research head.
newsitem.headline: SocGen-Crosby names Asian technical research head.

text.p: SocGen-Crosby said on Tuesday it had appointed Thomas Schroeder as head of technical research for the Asian region.
Schroeder, who worked for UBS prior to his new appointment, will be based in Hong Kong, it said in a statement.
Technical research is a new service offered by Soc-Gen Crosby, it said.
